articles.title: Health: Cheese and wine can REDUCE risk of Alzheimer's age-related cognitive decline, study shows - Daily Mail
articles.description: US researchers analysed the diet and cognitive powers of nearly 1,800 Britons over the period of a decade to identify foods that might have beneficial effects.
articles.content:
Eating cheese regularly, lamb once a week and indulging in a daily glass of red wine can help stave off Alzheimer's and age-related cognitive decline, a study concluded.
US researchers analysed the … [+4712 chars]

articles.title: The 14 areas of Wigan where Covid-19 infection rates are highest - Wigan Today
articles.description: Covid-19 rates have continued to drop across Wigan borough in recent weeks but some areas are still above the national average.
articles.content:
Currently the national average rate of infection across England is 149.2 per 100,000 of the population.
